Entei

#243 Raikou #245 Suicune
  • Contents
  • Info
  • Base stats
  • Evolution chart
  • Pokédex entries
  • Moves learned
  • Sprites
  • Locations
  • Language

Entei is a Fire type Pokémon introduced in Generation 2. It is known as the Volcano Pokémon.

Prior to Generation 7, Entei had Flash Fire as its hidden ability.

Entei

Additional artwork

Pokédex data

National № 244
Type Fire
Species Volcano Pokémon
Height 2.1 m (6′11″)
Weight 198.0 kg (436.5 lbs)
Abilities 1. Pressure
Inner Focus (hidden ability)
Local № 239 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)
244 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)

Training

EV yield 1 HP, 2 Attack
Catch rate 3 (0.4% with PokéBall, full HP)
Base Friendship 35 (lower than normal)
Base Exp. 261
Growth Rate Slow

Breeding

Egg Groups Undiscovered
Gender Genderless
Egg cycles 80 (20,304–20,560 steps)

Evolution chart

  • Entei does not evolve.

Entei changes

  • In Generations 5-6, Entei has Flash Fire as its hidden ability.
  • In Generations 2-4, Entei has a base experience yield of 217.
  • In Generation 2, Entei has a base Friendship value of 70.

Pokédex entries

Gold Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.
Silver A POKéMON that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
Crystal This brawny POKéMON courses around the earth, spouting flames hotter than a volcano’s magma.
Ruby
Sapphire		 ENTEI embodies the passion of magma. This POKéMON is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
FireRed A POKéMON that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
LeafGreen Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.
Emerald ENTEI embodies the passion of magma. It is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It blasts fire that consumes all that it touches.
Diamond
Pearl
Platinum		 It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
HeartGold Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to contain its sheer power, it races headlong around the land.
SoulSilver A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
Black
White
Black 2
White 2		 It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
X A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
Y It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
Omega Ruby
Alpha Sapphire		 Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
